CULDd575.First Lines:
Ther was a ladie leaned her backe to a wallHe tokke vppe peticote
                    smokke & all…
CULDd575.Last Lines:
…Yet he would not leave er soBut he did ease her & please
                    her befor he would goo
CULDd575.Note:
‘A shoon’ written to right. Formerly on a flyleaf of
                    Formerly on a flyleaf of Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Dd.5.76.
